name: Darkness RollerCoaster VR(Android)
description:
Not a simply Rollercoaster, an Amazing attraction !
Live a fantastic moment in this Darkness Roller Coaster !
Choose your way and go through cave in adventure world or dive into magical path worthy dark fairy tales...
More than 7 minutes of sensations !
With DARKNESS ROLLERCOASTER, enjoy to be scared !
NO CONTROLLER NEEDED !
Compatible with all VR Headset :
- Cardboard
- Virtual Vizor
- Homido
- FreeFly
- VRBox
....
TIPS : For have the better result, please follow this some rule
1/ Be sure you have enought Space for Download the App (200 Mo)+
2/ Be sure you don't run too many app at the same time for have 500 RAM available.
3/ If you have a double vision issue please scan a QR Code here : http://www.hypergridbusiness.com/faq/vr-headset-qr-codes/
4/ This is not a Gear VR app, a Gear VR version exist on the Oculus Store
